name: The haunting of Lost&Found Store
description:
A customer needs a lost object, you must find it!! However your store is now haunted... it will be hard..

Note: better graphic experience in Windows

Gamepad:

A or B
Jump
X or Y
Fire
Left Stick
Move and duck
DpadMove and duck

Keyboard:

Space JumpControl FireWASDMove and duck
ArrowsMove and duck
Tools:
  • Unity
  • Pyxel Edit
  • Groovepad
  • Ocenaudio
  • Reaper
